subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the Tour de France champion, wrapped up the title in the Giro d’Italia on Sunday, becoming the first non-Italian to win the race since 1996.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the Tour de France champion, wrapped up the title in the Giro d’Italia on Sunday, becoming the first non-Italian to win the race since 1996.
